alert.note: Alert for Brevard; Indian River (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued November 16 at 6:38PM EST by NWS Melbourne
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 830 PM EST THIS EVENING FOR PALM BAY AND FELLSMERE... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...A portion of east central Florida, including the following counties, Brevard and Indian River. * WHEN...Until 830 PM EST. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 638 PM EST, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. Minor flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly in the advisory area. Between 1 and 4 inches of rain have fallen. - Additional rainfall amounts up to 2 inches are expected over the area. This additional rain will result in minor flooding. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Palm Bay and Fellsmere. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
